body.name: OneSpace Essentials 5-Tier Bookshelf, White
features: Durable melamine finish is scratch-, shatter-, and water-resistant
Product dimensions | 11.4” D x 27.5” W x 68.9” H | Weight – 61.7 lbs.
Anti-tipping supports are not included with this bookshelf
Sturdy particleboard construction provides 44 pound per shelf weight capacity
Adjustable shelving makes storage simple | Shelves are supported by heavy-duty steel pegs
body.description: The 50-ld01shlf 5-tier bookshelf from One Space is a simple, sturdy storage solution. Three of the five shelves are adjustable, making organization a breeze. Each shelf is made of sturdy particleboard and supported by heavy duty steel pegs, affording them a 44 pound weight capacity each. The durable melamine finish is scratch-, shatter-, and water-resistant and is available in White, black, golden cherry, or Espresso woodgrain. Please note that anti-tipping supports are not included with this bookshelf. Surprisingly affordable with exceptional value, This bookshelf is offered by one space, part of the comfort products family. One Space makes home and office environments More stylish, comfortable, functional and rewarding. With its comprehensive line of home and office furniture, One Space is continually improving how people live, work, and enjoy life today. One Space is part of the comfort products family of brands. Headquartered in America's distribution capital, Memphis, TN, with a history dating back to 1919, comfort products makes design and innovation affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better value than Wayfair
reviews.reviewText: This was just what I was looking for. A basic bookshelf reasonably sized and priced. Anything on wayfair was closer to $150, but this was only $75! I liked how the sides are only 1 piece. The others I saw on amazon split it into two pieces I guess for easier shipping.It could definitely be a little sturdier, but it works and wasn't very expensive so can't complain.I saw another reviewer mention a sticker. unfortunately that it still true. it sticks right on the side and leaves a glue residue even after working to get it off. I almost removed a star for it...It only took about 45 minutes to put together by myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worst piece of garbage I have ever seen
reviews.reviewText: I got this as it met the size requirements for the space I needed. Upon arrival the large side had been cracked but not bad enough I couldn't make it work. Started putting it together and made it to the second to last step. The step where you literally are supposed to use tape to tape the back panel pieces together. I should have looked at all the directions before just starting to assemble it. And returned this trash. Butbi was already this far in. I use the 4 strips of tape they sent to literally tape this junk together then start to line up the last piece and the top holes aren't lining up look to be misdrilled. Try to get it to go together and literally hand tightening the screws cause this partical board junk is delicate. Get it together and start putting some books on for it to only collapse under an extremely light amount of books in the middle of the night. The particle board literally crumbled. I can't emphasize this enough don't waste your time or money on this. Crap like this should literally be blocked for sale on here. Would give a 0 review if I could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty sturdy, looks nice
reviews.reviewText: Looks great quality, it's heavy, but if you can see the back panel from the front there are always gaps, even with tape. Ignoring that though, it's served me very well even though I have it filled with heavy stuff

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good shelf, but construction is a bit of a balancing act
reviews.reviewText: When it's all together, it's a pretty good shelf. All parts were included and spare parts provided, which good one them, not everyone does that. I'm giving an extra star for that.I was able to construct it ok without too much difficulty, but I could see how it would be hard for some to get it together as putting one shelf on the others along with all the backing pieces requires some serious balancing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality Control Issues
reviews.reviewText: I've put together 3 of these shelves with one more on the way. Out of the 3 1 had all the hardware loose in the box. The box had huge holes with the styrofoam comeing out so I'm surprised i didn't lose and screws. Another ((pictured)) had a large crack. The crack is only visible from one side and is covered by the shelf once constructed. Not useing these for load bearing so it's fine but definitely not good. Hopfully #4 is ok. Once they are together they are very nice hence the 3 stars. But quality control can use improving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OneSpace Essential five tier, bookcase, color espresso, $88.78
reviews.reviewText: I typically never write reviews. I am just so impressed with this bookcase. (OneSpace Essential five tier, bookcase, color espresso, $88.78). It’s a two person job to put together, but it’s a great value to buy for the price. It’s a well made product, doesn’t look cheap, looks like real wood. It was well protected when shipped. Like for the price, it’s way more than what I expected, it has a beautiful finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NO. Just... NO
reviews.reviewText: I never review, but this project pissed me off so badly, I couldn't resist.This was the WORST bookcase I've ever had the misfortune of putting together: The instructions were a joke. There was no guidance or explanation when it came to installing the pieces front-to-back... normally, one of the ends would be grain so you can match them up uniformly, but with this piece of crap? Nope. EVERYTHING is solid, so you get to guess - and surprise, surprise, I guessed wrong. And you know how they always have that nice, easy backdrop that can be nailed onto the back? Not here! Instead, they thought it would be a hoot to give you 5 PANELS you have to jigsaw together with tape, making it IMPOSSIBLE to put together by yourself! Hilariously, the panels kept falling while trying to slot the top into place - which, OF COURSE, didn't fit, even after all the screws and washers were installed correctly, forcing us to slam the thing down with a hammer which pushed a screw right thru the cheap wood. And then, even when it's all done and standing proud, they couldn't even make the shelves easy to install. Oh no! Rather than slotting them into place like usual, they make you line them up and insert them into pre-drilled holes, which again, barely fit!! In the end, they didn't even give you camouflage tape to hide all the background screws AND after slotting everything together, there were still noticeable gaps where parts of the board didn't fit. This entire experience was a nightmare and I suffered bookcase rage for days following its installation!I swear, this manufacturer has never SEEN a bookcase, let alone knew what they were doing when they decided to build/sell one!! Please, for your sanity and my own, save yourself frustration and money and look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Manufacturer Support
reviews.reviewText: As received, the shelf unit had two of the same (left) sides, so we couldn't complete the assembly. We contacted the manufacturer with the replacement parts needed and we had them in-hand three days later. We finished the assembly and the shelving unit is much sturdier than similar units bought from Target.
